# Sprite Col
<!--
@name: Sprite Col
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
Test if two sprites are in collision
## Parameters

- **index**: Index of the sprite to test
- **start**: Index of the first sprite to test with
- **end**: Index of the last sprite to test with
---
